en.title: PD Willy Toh's Event 02nd April 2009.
en.content:
REPORT SUBMITTED BY FE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR WILLY TOH.

130 participants gathered at Lisa De Inn Hotel on 02nd April to understand and appreciate FE's Quantum Science Products. They listened attentively with great enthusiasm to key speaker, Presidential Director Rachel Thomas. Other speakers include Presidential Director Tilly Kong, Willy Toh and Stanley Liew. 

Presidential Director Willy Toh conducted a demonstration on the products. This was followed by testimonials by En. Khalid Hassan on his personal experience and recovery from Diabetes using the Quantum Pendant and Kelvin who spoke on how his Grandmother in-law recovered from thyroid using FE's Quantum Flask. Director Visaka Lee, a UK trained State Registered Nurse related her experience in using our Scalar Energy products to help healing of Dengue & Cancer patients. 

The gathering was treated to a sumptuous buffet and ended with 10 lucky participants walking home with Pendants as their lucky draw prizes.
